alert.note: Alert for Elbert; Lincoln (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued June 11 at 11:03PM MDT until June 12 at 4:00AM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... East Central Elbert County in east central Colorado... Central Lincoln County in east central Colorado... * Until 400 AM MDT. * At 1103 PM MDT, Local law enforcement reported thunderstorms hail and heavy rain across the warned area. Between 2 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is already occurring. Cars are stranded on Highway 71 from hail. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Law enforcement reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, gulches, roads, and poor drainage and low-lying areas. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Limon. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Move to higher ground now. Act quickly to protect your life.
